00029 class EffectCompressor: public EffectTwoPassSimpleMono {
00030    
00031 public:
00032    
00033    EffectCompressor();
00034    virtual ~EffectCompressor();
00035    
00036    virtual wxString GetEffectName() {
00037       return wxString(_("Compressor..."));
00038    }
00039    
00040    virtual std::set<wxString> GetEffectCategories() {
00041      std::set<wxString> result;
00042      result.insert(wxT("http://lv2plug.in/ns/lv2core#CompressorPlugin"));
00043      return result;
00044    }
00045 
00046    virtual wxString GetEffectIdentifier() {
00047       return wxString(wxT("Compressor"));
00048    }
00049 
00050    virtual wxString GetEffectAction() {
00051       return wxString(_("Applying Dynamic Range Compression..."));
00052    }
00053    
00054    virtual bool Init();
00055    virtual bool PromptUser();
00056    virtual bool TransferParameters( Shuttle & shuttle );
00057 
00058  protected:
00059    virtual bool TwoBufferProcessPass1(float *buffer1, sampleCount len1, float *buffer2, sampleCount len2);
00060    virtual bool ProcessPass2(float *buffer, sampleCount len);
00061 
00062  private:
00063 
00064    virtual bool NewTrackPass1();
00065    virtual bool InitPass1();
00066    virtual bool InitPass2();
00067 
00068    void FreshenCircle();

00070    double    mRMSSum;
00071    int       mCircleSize;
00072    int       mCirclePos;

00074 
00075    void Follow(float *buffer, float *env, int len, float *previous, int previous_len);
00076    float DoCompression(float x, double env);
00077    
00078    double    mAttackTime;
00079    double    mThresholdDB;
00080    double    mNoiseFloorDB;
00081    double    mRatio;
00082    bool      mNormalize;   //MJS
00083    bool      mUsePeak;
00084

00088    double    mDecayFactor;

00092    int       mNoiseCounter;
